PCD can affect cilia-like structures that help sperm cells move. As a result, men who have PCD may have fertility problems. (""Fertility"" refers to the ability to have children.)
                
For this test, a sample of semen is checked under a microscope. Abnormal sperm may be a sign of PCD.
